attributes.action: intervene in the case of Kerry Robertson and Mark Mcdougall who have had their bay snatched by fife social services who claim that the mother is not clever enough to look after her child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish for the government to intervene in the above case as we feel that it was an unfair and disgraceful act by fife social services. we feel that, until this is resolved, that no decent parent is safe regardless of her IQ.  we also feel that social services behave like this to fill 'so called' adoption quota's.  we would also like to point out that if social services had been this keen to act in the cases of Baby P and Victoria clumbie then these children would not have perished through the neglect of social services.  we ask for all social workers to be retrained to make them suitable for the job they are doing and to make them more accountable to the public for their mistakes and incompetence.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
